question: Who has been sworn-in as the new Governor of Tamil Nadu?
explanation: Banwarilal Purohit, a veteran political leader from Vidarbha district of Maharashtra, has been sworn-in as the new Governor of Tamil Nadu in a function held at Raj Bhavan in Chennai on October 6, 2017. Mr Purohit was sworn in as the Stateâ€™s 20th Governor. The Madras High Court Chief Justice Indira Banerjee administered the oath of office and secrecy to him.
